title: Ep. 647 - The Age Of The Snowflake
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, college students get a professor placed on indefinite leave for referring to a racial slur. Not using one -- referring to it. Also Five Headlines including AOC proving she wants unity by accusing Ted Cruz of attempted murder. And in our Daily Cancellation, I’m afraid we have to talk about COVID anal swabs.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
